EmailTemplate.name: Booking Status is Paid or Installment
EmailTemplate.subject: Regarding booking status is Paid or Installment
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
NCT
Dear {!Booking__c.First_Contact__c},
This is to confirm that you are now booked on the {!Course__c.Course_Name__c} {!Course__c.Course_Type__c} that will be happening at {!Venue__c.Name} {!Booking__c.Venue_Address__c} by {!Course__c.Start_Date__c} For more information, don't hesitate to contact us
we will be in touch shortly with availability and more information on the course. Lorem Ipsum is simply dummy text of the printing and typesetting industry. Lorem Ipsum has been the industry's standard dummy text ever since the 1500s, when an unknown printer took a galley
Regards, NCT Team Unsubscribe
